analysis: This update provides detailed information about a lease agreement for a property located at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut, including terms related to rent, utilities, repairs, security deposit, late payments, pets, tenant responsibilities, inspection rights, termination, and additional terms.
instructions: Create a new lease agreement for the property at 10 Miles Ave, Woodbridge, Connecticut.
Set the lessor to Woodbridge Community Partners, LLC.
Set the lessees to Rebecca Rodriguez, John Cain, and Jacqueline Cain.
Set the lease start date to 2024-07-01.
Set the lease end date to 2025-06-30.
Set the monthly rent amount to 2425.
Set the total monthly payment amount (including pet fee) to 2475.
Set the payment due date to the 1st day of each calendar month.
Set the payment method to bank deposit to Lessor’s Account at Bank of America or designated place.
Specify that the lessee shall pay for electric, internet, or cable services.
Specify that the lessor shall be responsible for water and sewer costs.
Specify that the lessee shall pay for professional cleaning services before vacating.
Set the lessee's responsibility for minor repairs up to 100.
Set the lessor's reimbursement for repairs over 250 per repair, unless caused by lessee's negligence.
Set the security deposit amount to 2600.
Specify conditions for security deposit refund: must have no outstanding utility bills or rent payments, no unreasonable damage or alterations, return all keys, and remove all personal items.
Set a late fee of 50 for any rent payment not paid by the due date, with a grace period of 10 days.
Allow pets with a monthly fee of 50, and specify that the lessee must comply with pet rules and regulations.
Specify that the lessee must maintain the premises in good order and repair.
Specify that the lessee must report any water leaks or malfunctions immediately.
Specify that the lessee is responsible for pest control and must take precautions against infestations.
Specify that the lessor has the right to inspect the premises with 24-hour notice.
Specify that the lessee must provide 30 days written notice for early termination and is responsible for rent for the remainder of the lease term.
Set the lessor telephone number to 2032335859.
Set the lessor email to Vadim.Tantsyura@outlook.com.
Specify that the lessee must maintain a minimum heat of 55 degrees Fahrenheit.
Specify that smoking is not allowed on the premises.
Specify that the lessee is responsible for maintaining smoke detectors and notifying the lessor if they are not working properly.
